text: Hello
Hi
I would like to tell you about a charity
OK, I'm listening.
The charity is called Save the Children. As the name suggests, this charity is helping the children around the world
I believe I have heard of this charity.
It is good. Let me give you a bit more information. Your donations would be used to ensure children's rights to health, education, safety. It helps especially in war zones like Syria
I understand but I am low on funds right now.
I can guess, but isn't there any amount you could donate like a little bit of money that you use for a snack or candy? Even a little amount helps.
Well, yes. Maybe I could give a quarter.
That would be great. And let me assure you, this is a professional and trustworthy fund. If you would like to check for more information, the website is  URL
I will check it out, thank you.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I would like to donate $0.25
Thank you, that would be great. Even with our little helps, the children around the world may have a better chance
Of course. I wish I could afford more. Maybe later.
I hope so. In the future, if you have better finances, please remember this fund.
Is this the end?
I think so, it had been 10 turns. And thank you again for your help. Have a good day.
You are welcome
